title: Create Directive Generator Schema
description: Creates a SDAM (Single Directive Angular Module) library

groupingFolder.description: The grouping folder that the component will be created in

name.description: The name of the component. This is optional if you only have one of the component types, e.g. shell or feature
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the component?

mountType.description: The mount type to use for the component test

x-prompt.message: Which mount type would you like to use for the component test?

items.label: none - do not create a cypress test runner test
component - mount the component class directly
story - mounting the component using a storybook story

unitTestType.description: The type of unit test file to create

x-prompt.message: What type of test file do you want to create?

items.label: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component
create a "spec.ts" test file for the new component that uses TestbBed
create a "spec.ts" test file for the new component that does not use TestbBed

strict.description: Makes the library have stricter type checking and build optimization options

enableIvy.description: Makes the library have ivy enabled in tsconfig.lib.prod.json. Should not be used with publishable libraries.
